Title: Downsizing
Actors: Matt Damon, Christoph Waltz, Hong Chau, Kristen Wiig
Plot: "Downsizing" follows a kindly occupational therapist who undergoes a new procedure to be shrunken to four inches tall so that he and his wife can help save the planet and afford a nice lifestyle at the same time.
Language: English, Spanish, Norwegian, French, Korean, Greek, Vietnamese
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 15 nominations.
